name: VaricellaTestsForVaricellaZosterVirusIgMAntibody
title: Varicella (Tests for Varicella zoster virus IgM Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Varicella zoster virus IgM antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Varicella zoster IgM),(Exclusion Criteria: Varicella zoster IgM panel tests)
